structure.unit: ARTICLE LI. MIAMI-DADE COUNTY HIV HEALTH SERVICES PLANNING COUNCIL.

text.section:
Sec. 2-554. Powers and duties.
The Council shall:
Have those powers and duties given HIV health services planning councils by the Ryan White Act as it presently exists or as it may be amended;
Advise the Board of County Commissioners on HIV/AIDS related health care services issues; and
Seek to have, in cooperation with other state and local bodies with planning authority, a comprehensive plan for the organization and delivery of all HIV/AIDS related health services in Miami-Dade County.
